TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IncrementalLassoHitTester extends System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester

Docs.summary: Dynamically hit tests a with a lasso.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IncrementalLassoHitTester hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it. Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.AddPoints%2A> method in the stylus events to add the points to the IncrementalLassoHitTester. When the points added to the IncrementalLassoHitTester selects or unselects a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>, the IncrementalLassoHitTester raises the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester.SelectionChanged> event
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to dynamically select strokes in a custom control. For the entire sample, see [How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)
[!code-cs[StrokeCollectionMethods#18](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/StrokeCollectionMethods/InkSelector.cs#18)] [!code-vb[StrokeCollectionMethods#18](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/StrokeCollectionMethods/InkSelector.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void AddPointsCore(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Windows.Point> points) cil managed
.method familyhidebysig instance void OnSelectionChanged(class System.Windows.Ink.LassoSelectionChangedEventArgs eventArgs) cil managed

Docs.summary: Occurs when the lasso path selects or unselects an ink .

remarks.format:
